about_the_game:
Notice:


This game is very early in the development. It will change considerably with time.
The game will be released in chapters.
If builds are provided they are just for testing, feedback, and support purposes.
Currently only the chapter 01 is available.
The rest of this page is about planned features and should not be taken as the current state of the game.

LifeDev is an exploration game with elements from Point/Click adventures.
Where you journey through the experiences of a person with CPTSD.
You will be able to experience and reflect upon this complicated reality.
You'll be finding clues, untangling the complexities, and recreating a new life on each step.
Finding, developing, and training new skills that will help you create a small door of hope.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game deals with adult and sensitive themes about trauma and cptsd.
Which brings difficult themes.
The intent of the game is to focus on overcoming these issues, and is planned for people who already is struggling.
So in order to not trigger them much, to not glorify these themes, and to focus on overcoming them; the topics will be only shown as little as possible, sometimes they will only be hinted at, or it will be a reference to it through a memento, or poem.
Also the game has minimal characters and minimal player interactions. So if there are depictions of any of these topics it will be minimal and as non-explicit as possible.
There will be dialogs, or pieces of text, discussing these topics in search of a way to heal. 

But it is critical to be able to express that they exists and express the emotions and feelings of the characters as they go through the healing process. How the character experiences emotionally and its drama is the most important part, not the source of it itself.
These emotional expressions could be very intense and crude. Mentioning topics like self-harm, self-deprecation, and abuse. These mentions will be minimal and toned down to the bare minimum necessary to convey the situation in order to establish a baseline from which move out of it.

short_description: 1st Person 3D Exploration Point&Click Intimate Journey. Based on real-life events. Experience trauma, gather clues, join the dots, find allies, unravel the truth, create your way out, face the demons, become stronger, challenge your "reality". Have you had enough already?
